actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to convey certain property to Morris L. Porter, Seldovia, Alaska.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to convey, by quitclaim deed, all right, title, and interest of the United States in certain property to a certain individual.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to convey certain property to Morris L. Porter, Seldovia, Alaska.
